feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX7][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 9, 05:00 - 14:00 UTC

Dec 12, 23:33 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/01/2024 05:00 UTC
End time : 09/01/2024 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Zerto update
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 3, 08:00 UTC  -  Jan 9, 20:00 UTC

Dec 20, 22:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/01/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 09/01/2024 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Synchronisation between primary and secondary sites will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for Zerto. Note that it should take 2 hours per site.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Rack R804L19
entry.content:
Dec 28, 19:09 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 28/12/2023 13:41 UTC
End Time : 28/12/2023 19:06 UTC
Root cause : Cooling system issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 28, 14:20 UTC
Identified - Start time: 28/12/2023 13:41 UTC
User impact : Hosts in rack R804L19 are currently unreachable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Root cause : Cooling system issue
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix.

entry.title: [RBX1A/SBG2A/GRA2A][HostedPrivateCloud] - Vcenter SSL certificat renewal - SecNumCLoud
entry.content:
Dec 23, 20:36 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 23, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 19, 21:51 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/12/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 23/12/2023 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Vcenter will not be accessible during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are going to renew all SSL certificat on RBX1A/SBG2A/GRA2A regions.

End time : 22/12/2023 20:00 UTC

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Zerto update
entry.content:
Dec 22, 21:36 UTC
Completed - The operations on this maintenance did not proceed as planned, a new schedule will be notified to you.

Dec 18, 08:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 13, 21:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 18/12/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 22/12/2023 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Synchronization between primary and secondary sites will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for Zerto. Note that it should take 2 hours per site.
An export of all VPGs will be done before importing them to the new Disaster Recovery Zerto v9.7U4
Please have a look on configuration of all VPGs : Regarding the VMs powered-on , VMs still present in VPG and not in production.
